Parameters: Context: the context object to use.
String: the recipient to send to.
getOrCreateThreadId(android.content.Cont.Description: This is a single-recipient version of getOrCreateThreadId. It's convenient for use with SMS messages.
getOrCreateThreadId(android.content.Cont.FullName: public static long getOrCreateThreadId (Context context, String recipient)

getOrCreateThreadId(android.content.Cont.Description: Given a set of recipients return its thread ID. If a thread exists containing the provided participants, return its thread ID. Otherwise, this will create a new thread containing the provided participants and return its ID.
getOrCreateThreadId(android.content.Cont.FullName: public static long getOrCreateThreadId (Context context, Set<String> recipients)

ClassDesc: Helper functions for the "threads" table used by MMS and SMS. Thread IDs are determined by the participants in a conversation and can be used to match both SMS and MMS messages. To avoid issues where applications might cache a thread ID, the thread ID of a deleted thread must not be reused to point at a new thread.
